title: Creator Alliance Assemble - Kaia x LINE NEXT
description: Web3 creator gathering with networking and Kaia Wave program introduction. Join creators, developers, and Web3 enthusiasts for an exclusive networking event featuring the Kaia ecosystem and LINE NEXT collaborations.
hostBy: pichapen, Amy, Bryan Phan - Kaia Foundation, Jemma Kim & 2 others

title: Kaia Hacker House: Castle Raid CTF Challenge
location: Kaia Labs, 331 North Bridge Road, #17-01/02 Odeon 331, Singapore 188720
description: An epic blockchain adventure during Token2049. Join us for an exclusive and thrilling Castle Raid Capture the Flag (CTF) event. This gamified CTF challenge features intricate challenges that blend fun with real-world security applications, allowing participants to explore blockchain technology while enjoying collaborative, team-based competition.

title: Shard Dubai Summit 2025: Where AI, Crypto, and Capital Converge
location: Al Safa Art & Design Library, 56QQ+7MW - 564 Al Wasl Rd - Jumeirah - Jumeirah 3 - Dubai - United Arab Emirates
description: On May 3, 2025, in Dubai, the world's most forward-thinking founders, investors, and industry leaders will gather to define the next era of Web3. Shard Dubai isn't just another crypto event—it's a high-impact summit designed for those who move markets, shape narratives, and position themselves ahead of the curve. Topics include AI x Crypto, DeFi, BTCFi & Institutional Liquidity, Stablecoins, RWA, and TradFi Insights.

title: Shard x Kaia Builders Brunch
location: FORMA, 56QQ+7MW Al Safa Art & Design Library - 564 Al Wasl Rd - Jumeirah - Jumeirah 3 - Dubai - United Arab Emirates
description: Shard x Kaia Builders Brunch: A Morning of Conversations & Connections. Unwind, reflect, and reconnect at the Kaia Builders Brunch powered by Shard, a relaxed yet refined gathering following the Shard Dubai Summit. Join fellow industry leaders to engage in deeper discussions, revisit key insights, and explore new collaborations, including learning more about Kaia, Asia's Gateway to Web3.

title: Next-Gen dApp Meet Up
location: Google Hong Kong Office, Level 21, Tower 2, Times Square, 1 Matheson St, Hong Kong
description: Join us for the Next-Gen Dapp Meet Up — a premier afternoon event dedicated to pioneering the future of decentralized applications, powered by the synergy between Kaia's versatile dapp ecosystem and Google Cloud's advanced technology. This exclusive gathering offers a dynamic platform for dapp developers, Web3 innovators, investors, and Google Cloud experts to connect, collaborate, and explore transformative opportunities.

title: K-BBQ DAO in Hong Kong
description: K-BBQ DAO networking event in Hong Kong, bringing together Web3 enthusiasts and blockchain developers for informal networking over Korean BBQ.
